Taylor Trades Outdoor Market - Opening Day
Taylor Trades Outdoor Market - Opening Day

Sunday March 01 - 07:00 AM to 02:00 PM

Santa Rosa Veterans Memorial Building

Taylor Trades is Sonoma County's premier Outdoor Market, held Sundays from 7AM – 2PM. Join us at the Santa Rosa Vets Building to shop a curated selection of antiques, vintage, vinyl, and collectibles. Enjoy local food trucks, coffee, and treats with FREE admission and FREE parking! Sebastopol Center For The Arts

Wayne Thiebaud's lushly painted still life's of cakes, pies, and gumball machines are icons of modern American Art. But there is another large body of Thiebaud's art that is relatively unknown: his prints. Thiebaud had a life-long passion for printmaking --- his first print was made of pieces of lin...

Environmental Review Committee Meeting
Environmental Review Committee Meeting

Tuesday March 03 - 09:00 AM to 09:00 AM

Sonoma County, CA

The function of the Environmental Review Committee (ERC) is to review public projects in accordance with the California Environmental Quality Act (CEQA) to determine whether a Mitigated Negative Declaration or an Environmental Impact Report is required. Source: Sonoma County Government

**Monoprinting** is a unique expression of printmaking typically painterly in effect, made by applying or painting ink to an historically, copper etching plate.  In contemporary work it can vary from zinc to acrylic or a gel plate, or no plate at all. In contrast to other printing processes, mono-pr...

The Unknown Wayne Thiebaud: Passionate Printmaker

Sebastopol Center For The Arts

But there is another large body of Thiebaud's art that is relatively unknown: his prints. Thiebaud had a life-long passion for printmaking --- his first print was made of pieces of lin...

Monoprints: Drawing & Printing Abstraction Two-day workshop

Sunday March 08 - 11:00 AM to 04:00 PM

Art Escape

**Monoprinting** is a unique expression of printmaking typically painterly in effect, made by applying or painting ink to an historically, copper etching plate.  In contemporary work it can vary from zinc to acrylic or a gel plate, or no plate at all. In contrast to other printing processes, mono-pr...

Saturday March 28 - 10:30 AM to 12:00 PM

Bachata with ALEX Ready to take your bachata to the next level? This intermediate bachata class is for dancers who have already mastered the basics and are ready for a new challenge. We’ll build on your foundation with a focus on more intricate footwork, technique, and partner work. Advanced turn...

Source: North Bay Bohemian
